sense.def:
To warn someone
pomeni nekomu povedati za možno nevarnost, da se je zave.

seg.quote: The least I can do is warn them that there is a danger.
I did warn you of possible failure.
I warn you it's going to be expensive.

sense.def:
To warn someone not to do something
pomeni nekomu svetovati, naj nečesa ne naredi, da bi se izognil možni nevarnosti ali kazni.

seg.quote: I warned him not to lose his temper with her.
I'm warning you, if you do that again there'll be trouble.

sense.def:
To warn someone off
pomeni nekomu reči, naj odide proč ali preneha nekaj delati zaradi možne nevarnosti ali kazni.

seg.quote: Intruders are warned off by the sound.
